abilities.name: Purification
abilities.description: Instantly heals a friendly unit and damages nearby enemy units.
abilities.notes: Heals allied units and damages enemies in the radius.

abilities.name: Repel
abilities.description: Grants debuff immunity to allied heroes and provides strength and health regen bonus based on current debuffs.
abilities.notes: Provides immunity to most debuffs and increases strength based on current debuffs.

abilities.name: Hammer of Purity
abilities.description: Deals pure damage based on main attack damage.
abilities.notes: Can be set to autocast. Deals pure damage based on attack damage.

abilities.name: Guardian Angel
abilities.description: Grants physical damage immunity to allied units.
abilities.notes: Provides immunity to physical damage for allied heroes.

innate_abilities.name: Degen Aura
innate_abilities.description: Passive aura that slows enemy movement speed and amplifies damage on affected enemies.
innate_abilities.notes: Slows enemies within the aura radius.
